svg.style: width: 916px; height: 3064px; cursor: grab; position: relative; visibility: visible;

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: PingFangSC-Medium, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 10px; min-height: 20px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

foreignObject.div:
软件部分：
决定操作模式，通过操作系统和应用程序发挥硬件功能

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 8px; min-height: 16px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

foreignObject.div: 流水线是指允许多个操作同时进行，而非顺序执行

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 8px; min-height: 16px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

foreignObject.div: 三个指针：PC指向正被取址的指令，PC-4（2）指向解码寄存器，PC-8（4）指向执行的指令，ARM32位模式下（Thumb16位模式下）

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: PingFangSC-Medium, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 10px; min-height: 20px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

foreignObject.div: 当处理器切换ARM/Thumb工作状态时，不影响处理器的模式或寄存器的内容

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 8px; min-height: 16px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

foreignObject.div: ​当ARM复位后，处理器处于SVC管理模式，处于ARM状态

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: PingFangSC-Medium, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 10px; min-height: 20px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 8px; min-height: 16px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);

foreignObject.div: Buffer当CPU写入或读取后，再不需要CPU的占用或占用总线时间，可自动将数据送入最终的地方或自动多读取一些字节。而Cache操纵始终需要CPU干预

div.style: outline: none; white-space: normal; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: PingFangSC-Medium, "PingFang SC"; max-width: 480px; min-width: 10px; min-height: 20px; line-height: 1.74; word-break: break-word; color: rgb(70, 70, 70);
